LanguageData.RadAwayHigh.label: Antiradin
LanguageData.RadAwayHigh.description: Due to the property of Antiradin to remove radiation from the body, the level of radioactive contamination decreases when it is used.
LanguageData.RadAwayTolerance.label: Craving for Antiradin
LanguageData.RadAwayTolerance.description: A craving for Antiradin has arisen, and addiction is not far away
LanguageData.RadAwayAddiction.label: Addiction to Antiradin
LanguageData.RadAwayAddiction.description: A strong Antiradin addiction has developed.
LanguageData.RadAwayAddiction.stages.1.label: Antiradin withdrawal
